Frequently Asked Questions

How quickly can I get my food delivered?

Standard delivery time is 30-45 minutes. Premium members enjoy 20-minute express delivery. You can track your order in real-time through our app.

What areas do you deliver to?

We currently deliver to all major areas within New York City. Check your zip code on our website to confirm delivery availability in your area.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept all major credit/debit cards, digital wallets (Apple Pay, Google Pay), and cash on delivery for orders under $50.

Can I cancel or modify my order?

Orders can be cancelled or modified within 5 minutes of placement. For scheduled orders, changes must be made at least 2 hours before delivery time.

Need Immediate Assistance?

Our customer support team is available 24/7 to help you with any questions or concerns.
